instructions: Open News for the first time, tap the Following tab, then tap the Follow button next to topics you want to follow. If there are topics that you don t want to appear in your feed, tap the Block button to block them. When you block a channel or topic, its stories won t appear in the Today feed or the News widget, and it will appear among your blocked channels and topics when you tap Following > Blocked Channels & Topics. Tap Discover Channels & Topics at the bottom of the screen, then tap the Follow button for each channel and topic you want to follow.
Tap Following, swipe to the bottom of the screen, then tap Manage Notifications. Turn on notifications for your preferred channels.
